title: unniru padham thozhum
sahitya: unniru padamtozhum varamum nI aruLvAyE!unnai allAl vERutuNai aRiyEn tAyE!  anupallavi  kanmavinaikaLaindaruL karuNA nidhi nIyE!enmanak koyil koNDa shrI brahannAyakiyE!  caraNam  viNNavar paNindiDum parmEshwari nIyE!un mahimai dinam pADip paravasam eydiDamunnam nAn seydatavappayan enRuNarndEnE!annaiyE unnaiyEkaNamum maRandaRiyEn
